languages.text: "Слово агента Золотого Трона — закон для любого имперца".
"The word of an agent of the Golden Throne is law for any subject of the Imperium."
languages.original_text: "Слово агента Золотого Трона — закон для любого имперца".

traits.locale_text: "The word of an agent of the Golden Throne is law for any Imperial."
"The word of an agent of the Golden Throne is law for any Imperial."
"The word of an agent of the Golden Throne is law for any Imperial."
"The word of an agent of the Golden Throne is law for any subject of the Imperium."

languages.text: “对帝国臣民而言，黄金王座代理人的话语就是法律。”
languages.original_text: "The word of an agent of the Golden Throne is law for any subject of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: “对所有帝国人民而言，黄金王座代理人的话语就是法律。”

languages.text: «La palabra de un agente del Trono Dorado es ley para cualquier súbdito del Imperium».
languages.original_text: "The word of an agent of the Golden Throne is law for any subject of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: «La palabra de un agente del Trono Dorado es ley para cualquier súbdito del Imperium».

languages.text: 「黄金の玉座の代理人の言葉は、帝国のあらゆる人物にとっての法なのだ」
languages.original_text: "The word of an agent of the Golden Throne is law for any subject of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: 「黄金の玉座の代理人の言葉は、帝国のあらゆる人物にとっての法なのだ」

languages.text: "Das Wort eines Agenten des Goldenen Throns ist für alle Untertanen des Imperiums Gesetz."
languages.original_text: "The word of an agent of the Golden Throne is law for any subject of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Das Wort eines Agenten des Goldenen Throns ist für alle Imperialen Gesetz."

languages.text: « La parole d'un agent du Trône d'Or fait loi pour tout sujet de l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "The word of an agent of the Golden Throne is law for any subject of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: « La parole d'un agent du Trône d'Or fait loi pour tout sujet de l'Empire. »

languages.text: "Altın Taht'ın hizmetkârları ne derse İmparatorluk kullarına onu yapmak düşer."
languages.original_text: "The word of an agent of the Golden Throne is law for any subject of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Altın Taht'ın hizmetkârları ne derse İmparatorluk kullarına onu yapmak düşer."
